name: Shimenawa's Reminiscence
description:
When you play a Talent card or a Character uses an Elemental Skill: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
If the character has at least 2 Energy, this character's Normal Attacks and Elemental Skills will deal +1 DMG.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or a Character uses an Elemental Skill:</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)\nIf the character has at least 2 $[K310], this character's Normal Attacks and Elemental Skills will deal +1 DMG.
